original: @476a mdangs phyir mi 'phrog pa ces bya ba bee d'urya'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: @476a mdangs phyir mi 'phrog pa ces bya ba bee d'urya'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the one called “Unconquerable Radiance,” the light of vaiḍūrya.

original: tadya th'a / aom ma ma raksha s'a ga re ma h'a s'a ga re /
analyzed: tadya th'a / aom ma ma raksha s'a ga re ma h'a s'a ga re /
translated: Tadyathā: Oṃ mama rakṣa sāgara mahasāgara

original: pu ru tse bu tsu ru /
analyzed: pu ru tse bu tsu ru /

original: gla rtsi dang / shu dag dang / bhi su nag po la 'de gu byas te /
analyzed: gla rtsi dang / shu dag dang / bhi su nag po la 'de gu byas te /
translated: Make a liniment of musk, sweet flag, and black bhisu.

original: lkog mar thig le byas te sngags lan bdun bzlas na /
analyzed: lkog mar thig le byas te sngags lan bdun bzlas na /
translated: Rub it on your throat and recite the mantra seven times.

original: 'byung po rnams kyis de'i mdangs 'phrog pa lta ci smos kyi /
analyzed: 'byung po rnams kyis de'i mdangs 'phrog pa lta ci smos kyi /
translated: Not to mention that spirits will steal your radiance,

original: blta bar yang mi nus so //
analyzed: blta bar yang mi nus so //
translated: they won’t even be able to look at you.
